values: To kid is to say something that is not true as a joke.
I am not really mad. I was kidding when I said I was angry.
n. 小孩；年轻人小山羊；小山羊皮
vt. & vi. 欺骗，戏弄，取笑

To kid is to joke or tease someone in a playful and good-natured way.
A kid is a young goat or a slang term for a child or young person.
n. 小孩；小山羊,vt. 欺骗；取笑；戏弄,vi. 欺骗；取笑；戏弄,adj. 小山羊皮制的；较年幼的
